H1.text: who won the most medals at the 2014 winter olympics. Canada

H2.text: who won the most medals at the 2014 winter olympics. Germany

H3.text: who won the most medals at the 2014 winter olympics. Russia

A4.text: Russia hosted the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi, Krasnodar Krai from 7 to 23 February 2014 and was the top medal recipient at those Games.

A5.text: Russia's medal count in 2014, 33 (before doping disqualifications), was its highest ever in the Winter Olympics, improving on the 1994 Games, when the Russian team earned 23 medals overall, and also beating the Soviet Union's best-ever medal count at the Winter Olympics.
